flawed_nl_solution:
After doubling he was able to hold 80*2=<<80*2=160>>160 kg per hand
Specialization gave him another 160*0.1=<<160*0.1=16>>16 kg
So he lifted 160+16=<<160+16=176>>176 kg per hand
That means he lifted a total of 325 kg
#### 325

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 352, not 325. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
